txt.en: Having explored and dealt with the shadows, you should reconvene with Oroniel in Caras Tilion.

'This river has been darkly enchanted for many lives of Men, at times more so and at other times less. But that corruption should now be waning - not growing stronger!\n\n'Upstream from here, these waters course past the old ruins of Caras Tilion. The place once was an Elven-hold, but we have long shunned it. I fear we must dare to tread there now, no matter what old memories or new inhabitants there dwell.'
You should go quickly to Oroniel, where she called out for aid in Caras Tilion.
You hear Oroniel shout your name from somewhere nearby!
Oroniel suspects the growing corruption of the river Rhachl√≥ may come from the abandoned ruins of Caras Tilion.
It would seem that many shadowy things dwell here

'There you are. I had begun to worry. I have wounded my leg somehow - upon some sorcerous trap, most likely.\n\n'But never mind that, [placeholder]. There is someone here - a man, an Elf, a wraith, I know not what. I think they have dwelt here some while!'
The ruins lie deep in shadow. Things move among the darkness.
Oroniel can be found in Caras Tilion.\n\nYou should quickly aid Oroniel, who calls out to you!
You should investigate Caras Tilion, which can be found in the mountains at the southern edge of Eryn Lasgalen.
Caras Tilion can be found in the mountains at the southern edge of Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should investigate Caras Tilion and defeat any of the darkness within its crumbled walls.
